cards_in_set.name: Rhino
cards_in_set.flavor: "I'm Rhino, I knock things down. That's what I do. That's who I am."

cards_in_set.name: Rhino
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Breakin' & Takin' side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Breakin' & Takin' side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
cards_in_set.flavor: "Out of my way!"

cards_in_set.name: Rhino
cards_in_set.text: Toughness. (This character enter play with a tough status card.) When Revealed: Stun each hero.
cards_in_set.real_text: Toughness. (This character enter play with a tough status card.) When Revealed: Stun each hero.
cards_in_set.flavor: "You brought this on yourself!"

cards_in_set.name: The Break-In!
cards_in_set.text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.real_text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.flavor: Rhino is trying to smash through the facility wall and steal a shipment of vibranium. You must stop him!
cards_in_set.back_text: Contents: Rhino (I) and Rhino (II). (Rhino (II) and Rhino (III) instead for expert mode.) Rhino and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Bomb Scare). Setup: Advance to stage 1B.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: Rhino is attacking a S.H.I.E.L.D. facility!

cards_in_set.name: Armored Rhino Suit
cards_in_set.text: Attach to Rhino. Forced Interrupt: When any amount of damage would be dealt to Rhino, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard Armored Rhino Suit.
cards_in_set.real_text: Attach to Rhino. Forced Interrupt: When any amount of damage would be dealt to Rhino, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard Armored Rhino Suit.

cards_in_set.name: Charge
cards_in_set.text: Attach to Rhino.
cards_in_set.real_text: Attach to Rhino.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Rhino attacks, the attack gains overkill. (Excess damage to any ally from this attack is dealt to that ally's controller.) At the end of this attack, discard Charge.

cards_in_set.name: Enhanced Ivory Horn
cards_in_set.text: Attach to Rhino. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card
cards_in_set.real_text: Attach to Rhino. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card

cards_in_set.name: Hydra Mercenary
cards_in_set.text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)
cards_in_set.real_text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)
cards_in_set.flavor: "What is Hydra doing here?" — Carol Danvers

cards_in_set.name: Sandman
cards_in_set.text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
cards_in_set.real_text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
cards_in_set.flavor: "I just wanna get paid!"

cards_in_set.name: Shocker
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
cards_in_set.flavor: "I bet you're shocked to see me!"

cards_in_set.name: Hard to Keep Down
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Rhino heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Rhino heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge.
cards_in_set.flavor: "You think you can stop me? What a joke!" — Rhino

cards_in_set.name: "I'm Tough"
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Give Rhino a tough status card. If Rhino already has a tough status card, this card gains surge.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Give Rhino a tough status card. If Rhino already has a tough status card, this card gains surge.
cards_in_set.flavor: "Bring it!" — Rhino

cards_in_set.name: Stampede
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Rhino attacks you. If a character is damaged by this attack, that character is stunned.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Rhino attacks you. If a character is damaged by this attack, that character is stunned.

cards_in_set.name: Breakin' & Takin'
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Hazard Icon: Deal +1 encounter card during the villain phase.)
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Hazard Icon: Deal +1 encounter card during the villain phase.)
cards_in_set.flavor: Rhino is breaking things and taking them!

cards_in_set.name: Crowd Control
cards_in_set.text: (Crisis Icon: While this scheme is in play, you cannot remove threat from the main scheme.)
cards_in_set.real_text: (Crisis Icon: While this scheme is in play, you cannot remove threat from the main scheme.)
cards_in_set.flavor: Panicked civilians crowd the area. It is difficult to confront Rhino without putting them at risk. Get the people to safety!

cards_in_set.name: Bomb Scare
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Acceleration Icon: Place +1 threat on the main scheme at the start of the villain phase.)
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here. (Acceleration Icon: Place +1 threat on the main scheme at the start of the villain phase.)
cards_in_set.flavor: Reports are out that Hydra agents have planted a bomb in a nearby hotel.

cards_in_set.name: Hydra Bomber
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.
cards_in_set.flavor: "I know that if you cut off one head, two more will take its place. But what if it blows up instead!" — She-Hulk

cards_in_set.name: Explosion
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: If Bomb Scare is in play, assign X damage among heroes and allies, where X is the amount of threat on Bomb Scare. If Bomb Scare is not in play, this card gains surge.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: If Bomb Scare is in play, assign X damage among heroes and allies, where X is the amount of threat on Bomb Scare. If Bomb Scare is not in play, this card gains surge.

cards_in_set.name: False Alarm
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, this card gains surge.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, this card gains surge.
cards_in_set.flavor: "Nothing to see here people!" — Iron Man

cards_in_set.name: Klaw
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Klaw attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for this activation.
cards_in_set.flavor: "Come meet your doom!"

cards_in_set.name: Klaw
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for The "Immortal" Klaw and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for The "Immortal" Klaw and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Klaw attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for this activation.

cards_in_set.name: Klaw
cards_in_set.text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
cards_in_set.real_text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Klaw attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for this activation.

cards_in_set.name: Underground Distribution
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
cards_in_set.flavor: Your investigation reveals that the criminal enterprise is operated by Klaw, an old rival of the Avengers!
cards_in_set.back_text: Contents: Klaw (I) and Klaw (II). (Klaw (II) and Klaw (III) instead for expert mode.) Klaw and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Masters of Evil) Setup: Search the encounter deck for the Defense Network side scheme and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: The attack on the S.H.I.E.L.D. facility has been linked to an underground weapons network.

cards_in_set.name: Secret Rendezvous
cards_in_set.text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.real_text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.flavor: Klaw is meeting with the Crimson Cowl. Klaw and the mysterious figure dart into the shadows when you confront them, and Klaw's minions move to cover their escape.
cards_in_set.back_text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player. Advance to stage 2B
cards_in_set.back_flavor: Klaw has found a buyer for his illegal weapons. It's up to you to stop the sale but the meeting is surrounded by Klaw's cronies.

cards_in_set.name: Sonic Converter
cards_in_set.text: Attach to Klaw. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.
cards_in_set.real_text: Attach to Klaw. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Response: After Klaw attacks and damages a character, stun that character.

cards_in_set.name: Solid-Sound Body
cards_in_set.text: Attach to Klaw. Klaw gains retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.) Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.
cards_in_set.real_text: Attach to Klaw. Klaw gains retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.) Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

cards_in_set.name: Armored Guard
cards_in_set.text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)
cards_in_set.real_text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.)

cards_in_set.name: Weapons Runner
cards_in_set.text: Surge. (After this card is revealed, reveal 1 additional encounter card.)
cards_in_set.real_text: Surge. (After this card is revealed, reveal 1 additional encounter card.)
cards_in_set.boost_text: Put Weapons Runner into play engaged with you.

cards_in_set.name: Klaw's Vengeance
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard 1 card at random from your hand. When Revealed (Hero): Klaw attacks you. If this attack does damage, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard 1 card at random from your hand. When Revealed (Hero): Klaw attacks you. If this attack does damage, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

cards_in_set.name: Sonic Boom
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Either spend [energy] [mental] [physical] or exhaust each character you control.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Either spend [energy] [mental] [physical] or exhaust each character you control.
cards_in_set.boost_text: If this activation deals damage to you, exhaust your hero.

cards_in_set.name: Sound Manipulation
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Klaw heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Take 2 damage. Klaw heals 2 damage.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Klaw heals 4 damage. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Take 2 damage. Klaw heals 2 damage.

cards_in_set.name: Defense Network
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
cards_in_set.flavor: Klaw's criminal enterprise is protected by a gang of hired thugs.

cards_in_set.name: Illegal Arms Factory
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
cards_in_set.flavor: Klaw is supplying villains with advanced weaponry from a clandestine arms facility.

cards_in_set.name: The "Immortal" Klaw
cards_in_set.text: Klaw gets +10 hit points. (When this scheme is defeated, Klaw loses those hit points.)
cards_in_set.real_text: Klaw gets +10 hit points. (When this scheme is defeated, Klaw loses those hit points.)
cards_in_set.flavor: Klaw's mastery of sound allows him to restore his solid form through sheer power of will.

cards_in_set.name: The Masters of Evil
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Masters of Evil]] minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Masters of Evil]] minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
cards_in_set.flavor: The Masters of Evil have arrived to attack the heroes!

cards_in_set.name: Radioactive Man
cards_in_set.boost_text: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Response: After Radioactive Man attacks you, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

cards_in_set.name: Whirlwind
cards_in_set.real_text: Give to the Tony Stark player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Tony Stark → remove Business Problems from the game. - Exhaust each upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.
cards_in_set.boost_text: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Whirlwind attacks you, also resolve his attack against each other hero.

cards_in_set.name: Tiger Shark
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1 [per_hero] threat here.
cards_in_set.boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Response: After Tiger Shark attacks, give him a tough status card.

cards_in_set.name: Melter
cards_in_set.real_text: Retaliate 1 (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)
cards_in_set.boost_text: Exhaust each ally you control.
cards_in_set.attack_text: The engaged player must defend against Melter's attacks with an ally they control, if able.

cards_in_set.name: Masters of Mayhem
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Each [[Masters of Evil]] minion attacks the hero it is engaged with. If no attacks were made this way, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Masters of Evil]] minion and put it into play engaged with you, the shuffle the encounter deck.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Each [[Masters of Evil]] minion attacks the hero it is engaged with. If no attacks were made this way, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Masters of Evil]] minion and put it into play engaged with you, the shuffle the encounter deck.

cards_in_set.name: Ultron
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck. For each printed [energy] resource a player discards this way, that player takes 1 damage.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Response: After Ultron attacks you, choose to either place 1 threat on the main scheme or put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion.

cards_in_set.name: Ultron
cards_in_set.real_text: Give to the Carol Danvers player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Carol Danvers → remove Family Emergency from the game. - You are stunned. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.
cards_in_set.attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Ultron attacks you, put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a [[Drone]] minion. Until the end of his attack, Ultron gets +1 ATK for each [[Drone]] minion engaged with you.

cards_in_set.name: Ultron
cards_in_set.text: Each [[Drone]] minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point. Ultron cannot take damage while a [[Drone]] minion is in play. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Ultron's Imperative side scheme and reveal it. Then shuffle the encounter deck.
cards_in_set.real_text: Each [[Drone]] minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point. Ultron cannot take damage while a [[Drone]] minion is in play. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Ultron's Imperative side scheme and reveal it. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

cards_in_set.name: The Crimson Cowl
cards_in_set.text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
cards_in_set.flavor: Ultron is using the components Klaw delivered in order to build an army of Ultron drones.
cards_in_set.back_text: Contents: Ultron (I) and Ultron (II). (Ultron (II) and Ultron (III) instead for expert mode.) Ultron and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Under Attack). Setup: Put the Ultron Drones environment into play. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advanced to stage 1B.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: Klaw's mysterious, red-hooded employer is really the genocidal android Ultron.

cards_in_set.name: Assault on NORAD
cards_in_set.text: Forced Response: After placing threat here during step one of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 2 threat here or put the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
cards_in_set.real_text: Forced Response: After placing threat here during step one of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 2 threat here or put the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion.
cards_in_set.flavor: If Ultron gains control of NORAD, he will have access to the United States' ballistic missile command!
cards_in_set.back_text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Advance to stage 2B.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: As you pursue Ultron, you receive a distress call from the North American Aerospace Defense Command in Colorado. They are besieged by an army of Ultron drones!

cards_in_set.name: Countdown to Oblivion
cards_in_set.text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game
cards_in_set.real_text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game
cards_in_set.flavor: It's up to you to save the world from nuclear armageddon!
cards_in_set.back_text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Advance to stage 3B.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: Ultron has seized control of NORAD. It's only a matter of time before he overcomes the command safeguards and launches the nuclear arsenal.

cards_in_set.name: Ultron Drones
cards_in_set.text: Each facedown [[Drone]] minion engaged with a player has a base SCH of 1, a base ATK of 1, and a base hit points of 1. Forced Response: After a facedown [[Drone]] minion is defeated, place that card in it's owners discard pile.
cards_in_set.real_text: Each facedown [[Drone]] minion engaged with a player has a base SCH of 1, a base ATK of 1, and a base hit points of 1. Forced Response: After a facedown [[Drone]] minion is defeated, place that card in it's owners discard pile.

cards_in_set.real_text: Give to the T'Challa player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust T'Challa → remove Affairs of State from the game. - Choose and discard a [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

cards_in_set.name: Usurp The Throne

Wrecker, Thunderball, Piledriver, and Bulldozer encounter decks. Setup: Put the Day of Reckoning, Thunderstruck, Pile It On!, and Clear the Road side schemes into play. Place the active counter on Wrecker. Advance to stage 1B.

cards_in_set.back_text: Contents: Red Skull (I) and Red Skull (II). Red Skull and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Hydra Assault and Hydra Patrol). Setup: Put the Red House into play. Shuffle every other side scheme into the side-scheme deck and set it next to the encounter deck (see insert). Set The Sleeper aside, out of play.

cards_in_set.name: New World Hydra
cards_in_set.text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play. If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.real_text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play. If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.back_text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: The Red Skull is one step closer to unlocking the full power of the Infinity Stone. You need to stop him before he does, and all reality is bent to his evil will.

cards_in_set.name: The Sleeper
cards_in_set.text: Guard. Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Revealed: The Sleeper engages the first player. When Defeated: Remove The Sleeper from the game.
cards_in_set.real_text: Guard. Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Revealed: The Sleeper engages the first player. When Defeated: Remove The Sleeper from the game.

cards_in_set.real_text: Toughness.

cards_in_set.flavor: "Careful, team. These guys pack a punch!" — Captain America

cards_in_set.text: Attach to Red Skull. Red Skull gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
cards_in_set.real_text: Attach to Red Skull. Red Skull gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

cards_in_set.flavor: "In chess, the only piece that truly matters is the King, and that's me." — Red Skull

cards_in_set.real_text: Incite 1. Attach to a side scheme. Forced Response: When attached side scheme is defeated, deal the first player an encounter card.
cards_in_set.flavor: The Infinity Stone gives Red Skull the power to bend reality to his will.

cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Exhaust a character you control for each side scheme in play.
cards_in_set.boost_text: Exhaust a character you control.
cards_in_set.flavor: "This is the end for you, Herr Captain!" — Red Skull

cards_in_set.name: The Red House
cards_in_set.text: Red Skull cannot take damage. Interrupt: When a character thwarts this side scheme, they may use their ATK instead of their THW.
cards_in_set.real_text: Red Skull cannot take damage. Interrupt: When a character thwarts this side scheme, they may use their ATK instead of their THW.
cards_in_set.flavor: Red Skull built his fortress over the White House as a symbol of Hydra's conquest over America.

cards_in_set.name: The Sleeper Awakened
cards_in_set.text: This scheme cannot leave play while The Sleeper is in play. When Revealed: Put The Sleeper into play engaged with the first player. When The Sleeper is defeated, remove this card from the game.
cards_in_set.real_text: This scheme cannot leave play while The Sleeper is in play. When Revealed: Put The Sleeper into play engaged with the first player. When The Sleeper is defeated, remove this card from the game.
cards_in_set.flavor: Rising from the Potomac River, The Sleeper has awakened to answer Red Skull's summons.

cards_in_set.name: Prison Camps
cards_in_set.text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally, puts it into play, and shuffles their deck.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally, puts it into play, and shuffles their deck.
cards_in_set.flavor: Under Hydra's rule, families are separated and incarcerated without due process.

cards_in_set.name: Censor the Past

cards_in_set.real_text: When Defeated: Each player chooses up to 3 cards in their discard pile and shuffles them into their deck.
cards_in_set.flavor: Hydra controls all media outlets and uses propaganda to turn the masses against the heroes of the past.

cards_in_set.name: Hydra Reinforcements
cards_in_set.text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards a non-Elite minion.
cards_in_set.real_text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards a non-Elite minion.
cards_in_set.flavor: What Hydra lacks in skill, they make up for with sheer numbers.

cards_in_set.name: Mass Chaos

cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck and places 1 threat here for each different type of resource icon ([energy],[mental],[physical], or [wild]) they discarded this way.
cards_in_set.flavor: Red Skull creates catastrophes across the country to keep his enemies busy.

cards_in_set.name: Kang's Arrival

cards_in_set.real_text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.flavor: Kang believes that by defeating Earth's mightiest heroes, the rest of the planet will submit to his rule.
cards_in_set.back_text: Contents: Kang (I), each Kang (II), and Kang (III). Kang and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Temporal). Setup: Set each Kang (II), Kang (III), and Kang's Dominion side scheme aside. remove each player's obligation cards from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck.

cards_in_set.name: The Master of Time
cards_in_set.text: Forced Interrupt: When an acceleration token would be placed on another scheme, place it here instead. Players cannot join this game area unless there are no other game areas remaining. When all the players have joined this game area, advanced to stage 4A.
cards_in_set.real_text: Forced Interrupt: When an acceleration token would be placed on another scheme, place it here instead. Players cannot join this game area unless there are no other game areas remaining. When all the players have joined this game area, advanced to stage 4A.
cards_in_set.back_text: When Revealed: Place 1 acceleration token here for each side scheme in play, then discard each side scheme. Each player reveals a random stage 3A in turn oder. Remove any unused stage 3 schemes from the game.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: Kang reels back, but saves himself by separating the heroes through time and space.

cards_in_set.name: The Chronopolis
cards_in_set.text: Forced Response: After this stage is complete, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Immortus) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is complete.
cards_in_set.real_text: Forced Response: After this stage is complete, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Immortus) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is complete.
cards_in_set.back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Immortus) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

cards_in_set.back_text: Contents: Marauders on side A (side B for expert mode). Morlock Siege and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Military Grade and Mutant Slayers). Setup: Put the Routed environment into play. Set the Hide! treachery and each Morlock ally aside. Shuffle the villains together (without looking) to create the villain deck. The top card of this deck is in play.

cards_in_set.text: Action: Exhaust a [[MORLOCK]] ally → shuffle Hide! from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If there are 3 villains under Routed, the players win the game. If this stage is completed or there are no Morlock allies in play, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.real_text: Action: Exhaust a [[MORLOCK]] ally → shuffle Hide! from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If there are 3 villains under Routed, the players win the game. If this stage is completed or there are no Morlock allies in play, the players lose the game.

Shuffle the Hide! treachery into the encounter deck. If the previous stage was advanced by knock counters, give each Morlock ally a tough status card.

Mister Sinister, Flight, Super Strength, Telepathy, Hope Summers, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Nasty Boys). Setup: Set aside the Flight, Super Strength, and Telepathy encounter sets. Put Hope Summers into play under the first player's control.

cards_in_set.name: Sinister Ends
cards_in_set.text: Forced Interrupt: When Mister Sinister attacks, he attacks Hope Summers instead. (Other characters may defend the attack.) If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.real_text: Forced Interrupt: When Mister Sinister attacks, he attacks Hope Summers instead. (Other characters may defend the attack.) If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
cards_in_set.flavor: "I should thank you," Sinister sneers. "You've done what my bumbling flunkies could not: You brought me Hope."
cards_in_set.back_text: When Revealed: Deal each player 1 facedown encounter card.
cards_in_set.back_flavor: "Gaze upon my power and despair!" Sinister cackles. "Once I add Hope's mutation into my genetic code, I will be capable of mimicking any mutant's powers, and thus will have attained perfection!"

Hope breaks free from Stryfe's grasp, but she struggles to contain his powerful psionic energies.
"I will leave Hope to finish the job of killing you all," Stryfe laughs. "I have work to do bringing about the Apocalypse!"
